channel.title: Problem again!

item.title: Problem again!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I’m writing this roughly based on your code, but try this:

if (playerRights == 1) { yell("@blu@ the moderator,@red@ "+playerName+",@red@ has logged in.@blu@"); } if (playerRights == 2) { yell("@blu@ the administrator,@red@ "+playerName+",@red@ has logged in.@blu@"); } if (playerRights == 3) { yell("@blu@ the owner,@red@ "+playerName+",@red@ has logged in.@blu@"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Problem again!
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

well i got the following errors for this code.
errors:[code]client.java:10110: ‘)’ expected
yell("@blu@ the moderator, @red@+ “playername” +,@red@ has logged in.@blu@");
^

^

;

;
